detail_desc: Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cropped top in a crinkled cotton weave. Square neckline with covered elastication, short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems, and smocking and a small frill trim at the hem. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with a lightly brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted vest top in soft stretch jersey.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a polo neck. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
KAROLINA KIJAK x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with the reverse side showing.
Large scarf in a soft, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with pendants. One pendant is decorated with rhinestones. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections, a detachable faux fur collar, diagonal zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. One pair neon-coloured. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2.5 cm.
Top in soft faux shearling with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Joggers in heavy sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.

Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a zip fly and press-stud. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and a small fabric appliqué at the hem of one leg.
Two-button jacket in a textured linen and cotton weave with a decorative chest pocket, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined.
Short top in a cotton weave with wide, flounced broderie anglaise trims that start at the front and continue over the shoulders to the back. Smocking at the sides.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit, marled cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
Cold-shoulder jumper in a soft rib knit with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, welt side pockets and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved lace blouse with lacing at the back, a frill trim over the shoulders and at the cuffs, and a scalloped hem.
Strapless, lace bandeau bra with lined, lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Side support, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.
Scarf in a soft cable knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 28x180 cm.
Sleeveless dresses in soft cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a print motif on the front, slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Longer and rounded at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a recycled polyester weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Blouse in a striped cotton weave with an opening with buttons at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the top, long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs, and a flared lower section.
Scarf in an airy, patterned weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways and lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, ribbed hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support.

Jumpsuit in airy, softly draping jersey containing glittery threads with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a frill-trimmed wrapover front. Concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elastication at the waist and wide, straight-cut legs. Unlined.
Knee-length coat in a stretch cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons and side pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs, and a pleat at the back. Unlined.
Wide blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, textured knit with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short, shimmering metallic dress in pleated jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a raw-edge hem. Jersey underdress.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
Hair elastics without metal clips decorated with plastic beads.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.

Set with a hooded jacket and joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jacket with a lined hood, diagonal opening with press-studs at the top and a zip to the hem, printed kangaroo pocket with sewn-on ears, and ribbed cuffs. Joggers with elastication and a contrasting colour drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned fleece. Long-sleeved top with a drawstring at the hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight legs.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a decorative bow at the waist.
Short dress in satin with a sheen. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and pleats at the front, a seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined bodice.
Short, A-line skirt in washed cotton denim with buttons down the front and vertical seams.
Blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Round-necked T-shirts in stretch cotton jersey.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and seams at the knees.
Calf-length dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, frill-trimmed puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Fitted jersey dress with long, straight sleeves. Unlined.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a turned-up hem with an appliqué.

Dress in a crêpe weave with a slight sheen. Gathers at the shoulders and deep V-neck at the front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Wide elasticated seam at the waist with a tie and decorative frill, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Set with a vest top and shorts in soft cotton jersey. Patterned vest top with a print motif and narrow ribbing around the neckline and armholes. Slub jersey shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat, while keeping the jeans in shape. The jeans have a regular waist and skinny legs.
Blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs and a seam at the waist with a peplum. Elastication at the back and ties at the front.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem.
Nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and wrapover front. Elastication at the back of the waistband and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave. High waist with wide elastication, and short, wide legs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.
Beret in imitation patent leather with a grosgrain trim on the inside edge. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour side panels. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Sleeveless satin jumpsuit in a narrow cut at the top with a stand-up collar with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck, and an open section at the back. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and straight, wide legs. Lined at the top. The jumpsuit is made partly from recycled polyester.
Hair elastics decorated with pompoms.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, front and back pockets and frayed-edge hems.
V-neck dress in an airy weave with short, double-flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and ties at the sides. Lined.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a button at the front. Soft cotton lining.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front, flap front pockets and gathered 3/4-length sleeves. Lined.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
